data.eml:eml: Two new species of the batfish genus Malthopsis (Lophiiformes: Ogcocephalidae) from the Western Indian Ocean

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ho, Hsuan-Ching (2013): Two new species of the batfish genus Malthopsis (Lophiiformes: Ogcocephalidae) from the Western Indian Ocean. Zootaxa 3716 (2): 289-300, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3716.2.9
